content: *this cable knit blanket is a super cozy classic that you ll love to curl up with yarnspirations * --- *skill level * intermediate --- **materials ** bernat® blanket™ 10 5 oz/300 g 258 yds/234 m vintage white 10006 *5 balls* *additional materials * * size us 11 8 mm circular knitting needle 36 \ 90 cm\ long * cable needle --- also available as cushy cables knit blanket 1 michaels project sheet #68541 1 http //www michaels com/bernat-blanket-cushy-cables-knit-blanket/b_68541 html
